text: Willem Werner Hubert "Willy" ClaesDecan, Rik, Wie is wie in Vlaanderen 2000-2002, Brussel: BRD, 1999. (; born 24 November 1938) is a Belgian politician. He served as the eighth Secretary General of NATO, from 1994 to 1995. Claes was a member of the Socialist Party. ==References== ==Other websites== *NATO Declassified - Willy Claes (biography) *NATO's Who is Who Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian musicians Category:Conductors Category:Flemish politicians Category:Government ministers of Belgium Category:People from Hasselt Category:Secretaries General of NATO Category:Socialistische Partij Anders politicians
title: Willy Claes
